Package org.openwms.common.comm.osip.sysu

package org.openwms.common.comm.osip.sysu
Contains types responsible for dealing with OSIP SYSU telegrams.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.openwms.common.comm.osip
    This package contains all types to handle OSIP telegrams.
    org.openwms.common.comm.osip.sysu.tcp
    Contains types to serialize and deserialize OSIP SYSU telegrams and messages.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AmqpSystemUpdateMessageHandler
    A AmqpSystemUpdateMessageHandler.
    HttpSystemUpdateMessageHandler
    A HttpSystemUpdateMessageHandler forwards system updates to the LocationGroup services directly without using the routing service.
    HttpSystemUpdateMessageHandler.RequestVO
     
    HttpSystemUpdateMessageHandler.RequestVO.Builder
     
    SystemUpdateMessage
    A SystemUpdateMessage reflects the OSIP SYSU telegram type and is used to change the state of a LocationGroup.
    SystemUpdateMessage.Builder
     
    SystemUpdateMessageConfiguration
    A SystemUpdateMessageConfiguration is the JavaConfig for the SystemUpdateMessage handling part.
    SystemUpdateServiceActivator
    A SystemUpdateServiceActivator implements the Service Activator pattern and delegates incoming SystemUpdateMessages to the appropriate handler function.
